about_the_game:
Journey alongside the Second Prince of the Galens Empire to unlock ancient secrets in this romantic fantasy adventure visual novel with a dark twist. With multiple endings and immersive battle sequences, will you write your destiny, or repeat the mistakes of those whom history has forgotten?
Inspired by classic JRPGs and romance anime, Dual Chroma features a single multi-faceted love interest and an immersive story punctuated by narrative battles.

STORY
For centuries after the Ashen War, the Empire has lived in peace under the protective power of the reigning Galens line. Tales of the dark era—of vile monsters and the heroes that vanquished them—fell into legend… until now.

Immerse yourself in the world of Dual Chroma as the bright young scholar, assuming their new role as advisor to Prince Keldrannon. When ancient forces long-thought to be vanquished threaten once again, you must work together with the Prince to save the Empire. Just how far does your connection to the Prince run? Will unearthing the secrets of the past and surviving the schemes of the Imperial Court allow you to stand by Keldran's side and win his heart—or will you fall victim to the clutches of the 'forgotten' great evil?

Your decisions will shape your shared destiny—and the fate of the continent of Aradal—forever.




FEATURES:
High fantasy immersive story:
Enter the fictional continent of Aradal and discover a world of magic, monsters, and mystery!

Multiple dynamics and outcomes:
The Good, the Bad, and the One True Ending—there are eight total outcomes possible for this magical tale! Every single choice made leads you down a path—this is your story, so you choose how it will end.

Nameable protagonist:
Immerse yourself into the story by giving the protagonist a name of your choosing.

Immersive, RPG-like battles:
Fight alongside the Prince against the forces of darkness! Make the best of your unique skill sets and vanquish enemies in a streamlined, turn-based RPG system integrated into the story!

Single, in-depth route:
This game features one romanceable character, but a myriad of ways to tell your love story!

Romantic CGs:
Unlock romantic scenes and beautiful artwork as you get cozier with the Prince!

Replay scenes:
Replay your favorite scenes/voice lines over and over to your heart’s content!

Partial Voice Acting: We have a fantastic cast of talented actors helping bring our characters to life!
